description: New Canon BP-827 replacement Li-Ion rechargeable Intelligent battery. Rated with 2900mAh, the battery lasts 6 hours. THE BATTERY IS MADE BY INFO-CHIP, WHICH CAN SHOW BATTERY REMAINING TIME ON CAMCORDER LCD. It also can be charged by Canon original charger and camcorder.
title: EastStar Pro Li-ion High Capacity Intelligent Camcorder Battery Pack to Replace Canon BP-827
